definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
erhua variant of 炸土豆條|炸土豆条[zha2 tu3 dou4 tiao2]

sentences.english: Drinking potato juice every day can ease indigestion, a new study has found.
sentences.chinese: 一項新的調查，每天喝土豆汁可以消化不良的症狀。

sentences.english: We dined on chicken, potatoes, salad and apple-pie.
sentences.chinese: 正餐我們喫的是雞，土豆，涼拌菜和蘋果餡餅。

sentences.english: Sophie:Now wash them, then dice the potatoes and bell peppers. Then slice the meat.
sentences.chinese: 現在把他們都洗乾淨，青椒和土豆切成丁兒，肉切片。

sentences.english: Some gardeners plant potatoes under straw, or stems of dried grain.
sentences.chinese: 一些園藝家在稿杆或曬乾了的穀物莖杆下中土豆。

sentences.english: Potatoes and cauliflower tend to turn brown when boiling, especially when you're having company for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 土豆和花菜在水煮的時候容易變成咖啡色。

sentences.english: Potatoes are a good source of new truants nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 土豆是一種很好的營養資源。

sentences.english: The virus came to the tulip from a louse living on peaches and potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 這些病毒來自於桃子和土豆上的一種寄生蟲。

sentences.english: Above grilled items are served with baked potato or French fries and vegetables of the day.
sentences.chinese: 以上各式烤肉配烤土豆或炸薯條和每日時蔬。

sentences.english: Yes, even though some of the potatoes had eyes.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，不過一些土豆有芽眼。

sentences.english: She chucked the mouldy potatoes in the litterbin.
sentences.chinese: 她把發黴的土豆扔進垃圾箱。

sentences.english: I'll pass on the fried potato crisp, but take the porridge.
sentences.chinese: 炸土豆片我不吃了，粥還是要喝的。

sentences.english: This game has watermelon bowling, two bonus games potatoes mine warfare.
sentences.chinese: 本遊戲有西瓜保齡球，土豆地雷戰兩個獎勵遊戲。

sentences.english: Rib Eye, with Roasted Provencal Potatoes, Spinach Cream and Vegetable Ragout.
sentences.chinese: 肉眼牛肉，配香草烤土豆，奶油菠菜和燴蔬菜。
我喜歡土豆，不喜歡茄子。

sentences.english: Label each picture the appropriate style of cooking potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 請把正確的土豆烹飪方法填到相應的圖片下方。

sentences.english: Would you like a baked potato or French fries with that?
sentences.chinese: 配菜您要烤土豆還是炸薯條？

definition: eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
